hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
export VMNAME="HG-$$" /puppet/jenkins/bin/magrathea.init login /puppet/jenkins/bin/magrathea.init build /puppet/jenkins/bin/magrathea.init start /puppet/jenkins/bin/magrathea.init fixup /puppet/jenkins/bin/magrathea.init ssh 'wget http://esb.metacentrum.cz/rsyslog2.git/bootstrap.install.sh && sh -x bootstrap.install.sh' ################ /puppet/jenkins/bin/magrathea.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh phase2.install.sh'
/puppet/jenkins/bin/magrathea.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh hpglastopf.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/magrathea.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh hpglastopf/tests/hpglastopf.sh'
/puppet/jenkins/bin/magrathea.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh hpucho-tcp.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/magrathea.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh hpucho/tests/tcp.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/magrathea.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh hpucho-udp.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/magrathea.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh hpucho/tests/udp.sh'
